ground_truth: A set of swings and a climbing frame stand in a rural backyard, along with a picnic table and a brick barbecue, overlooked by an upstairs window. Inside, a framed photo on a bedside table shows a smiling family: mum, dad, a young boy, and a girl. The dad wears a clerical collar. Suddenly, the same man leans up on his elbows in bed, his eyes darting feverishly around the simply furnished room. He relaxes and sits up. The man, Graham Hess, comes out of his bedroom wearing a black t-shirt and pajama bottoms. He walks along the landing in his bare feet and comes to a closed door with some hand-drawn children's pictures stuck to it. Graham pauses for a moment to listen at the door, then returns to his bedroom, picking up some discarded socks on the way. He's in his mid-40s with short dark hair and a rugged handsome face. Graham crosses the bathroom and stares out of the door, his toothbrush in his mouth. He strides across the landing, opens the door to the children's room, and glances around. A younger man in a similar rural-style bedroom suddenly jolts and tumbles out of bed. He jumps to his feet and strains to listen. Graham rushes out of his wooden farmhouse and heads towards a whitewashed barn, while the younger man runs down a flight of steps from the other floor. Graham and the young man, Merrill, charge through a field of tall green maize. They stop when they reach a gap and look along a clear pathway, which cuts through the crop. A dark-haired girl of about six-years-old stands a little further down the path. The two men run over to her, and Graham grabs her by the arms. Merrill picks up Bo, and Graham dashes on through the maize. He reaches a fair-haired boy of about 10, who stares glassily across the field. Graham turns Morgan's head to face him. Morgan puts his hand around his father's jaw and turns his head to face in the direction he had been staring. Graham stands and slowly walks through the maize, followed by Merrill, who's still carrying Bo in his arms. Graham stops and glances around anxiously. He swallows hard and tentatively steps forward onto a sea of flattened maize stalks. Graham stares in wonder as he, Merrill, Morgan, and Bo come to the perimeter of a vast circular expanse of flattened maize. Two large Alsatians pace around uneasily in the center. An aerial view shows Graham and his family standing in the circle, which is about 100 yards in diameter. Another crop circle lies beside it, the same size but with a small semi-circle of maize still standing within it.

test_cases.name: Synonym Substitution
test_cases.description: A collection of swings and a climbing framework stand in a rural backyard, along with a picnic table and a brick grille, overlooked by an upstairs pane. Inside, a framed photograph on a bedside stand shows a smiling kin: mum, dad, a young lad, and a girl. The dad wears a clerical collar. Suddenly, the same man leans up on his elbows in bed, his eyes darting feverishly around the simply furnished chamber. He relaxes and sits up. The man, Graham Hess, emerges from his bedroom wearing a black t-shirt and pajama bottoms. He walks along the landing in his bare feet and arrives at a closed gate with some hand-drawn children's illustrations stuck to it. Graham pauses for a moment to listen at the door, then returns to his bedroom, picking up some discarded socks on the way. He's in his mid-40s with short dark hair and a rugged handsome visage. Graham crosses the lavatory and stares out of the gate, his toothbrush in his mouth. He strides across the landing, opens the door to the children's chamber, and glances around. A younger man in a similar rural-style bedroom suddenly jolts and tumbles out of bed. He jumps to his feet and strains to listen. Graham rushes out of his wooden farmhouse and heads towards a whitewashed barn, while the younger man runs down a flight of steps from the other floor. Graham and the young man, Merrill, charge through a field of tall green corn. They stop when they reach a gap and look along a clear pathway, which cuts through the crop. A dark-haired girl of about six-years-old stands a little further down the path. The two men run over to her, and Graham grabs her by the arms. Merrill picks up Bo, and Graham dashes on through the corn. He reaches a fair-haired lad of about 10, who stares glassily across the field. Graham turns Morgan's head to face him. Morgan puts his hand around his father's jaw and turns his head to face in the direction he had been staring. Graham stands and slowly walks through the corn, followed by Merrill, who's still carrying Bo in his arms. Graham stops and glances around anxiously. He swallows hard and tentatively steps forward onto a sea of flattened maize stalks. Graham stares in wonder as he, Merrill, Morgan, and Bo come to the perimeter of a vast circular expanse of flattened maize. Two large Alsatians pace around uneasily in the center. An aerial view shows Graham and his family standing in the circle, which is about 100 yards in diameter. Another crop circle lies beside it, the same size but with a small semi-circle of maize still standing within it.

test_cases.name: Active <-> Passive Transformation
test_cases.description: A set of swings and a climbing frame are stood in a rural backyard, along with a picnic table and a brick barbecue, which an upstairs window overlooks. Inside, a framed photo on a bedside table is shown to a smiling family: mum, dad, a young boy, and a girl. A clerical collar is worn by the dad. Suddenly, the same man is seen to lean up on his elbows in bed, his eyes darting feverishly around the simply furnished room. He is relaxed and he sits up. Graham Hess, the man, is seen to come out of his bedroom wearing a black t-shirt and pajama bottoms. Along the landing, he is walked in his bare feet, and he comes to a closed door with some hand-drawn children's pictures stuck to it. Graham is paused for a moment to listen at the door, then his bedroom is returned to, and some discarded socks are picked up by him on the way. He's in his mid-40s with short dark hair and a rugged handsome face. The bathroom is crossed by Graham, and he is stared out of the door, his toothbrush in his mouth. The landing is strided across by him, the door to the children's room is opened by him, and he is glanced around. A younger man in a similar rural-style bedroom suddenly is jolted and tumbled out of bed. He jumps to his feet and listens with strain. Graham rushes out of his wooden farmhouse and heads toward a whitewashed barn, while the younger man runs down a flight of steps from the other floor. Through a field of tall green maize, Graham and the young man, Merrill, are charged. They stop when they reach a gap and look along a clear pathway, which the crop cuts through. A dark-haired girl of about six-years-old is stood a little further down the path. The two men are run over to her, and she is grabbed by Graham by the arms. Bo is picked up by Merrill, and Graham dashes on through the maize. A fair-haired boy of about 10 is reached by him, who stares glassily across the field. Morgan's head is turned by Graham to face him. Morgan puts his hand around his father's jaw and turns Graham's head to face in the direction Morgan had been staring. Graham stands and slowly walks through the maize, and Merrill follows him, carrying Bo in his arms. Anxiously, Graham is glanced around and he stops. He swallows hard and is tentatively stepping forward onto a sea of flattened maize stalks. In wonder, Graham stares as Merrill, Morgan, Bo, and he come to the perimeter of a vast circular expanse of flattened maize. Two large Alsatians are seen to pace around uneasily in the center. An aerial view shows Graham and his family as they stand in the circle, which is about 100 yards in diameter. Another crop circle lies beside it, which the same size but within it, a small semi-circle of maize is still standing.

test_cases.name: Brevity - L1
test_cases.description: Swings, a climbing frame, a picnic table, and a brick barbecue occupy a rural backyard, visible from an upstairs window. Inside, a bedside table holds a framed photo of a smiling family: mom, dad, a young boy, and a girl. The dad wears a clerical collar. Abruptly, the man, Graham Hess, rises in bed, eyes darting feverishly in the simply furnished room. He relaxes, sits up, and exits his room in a black t-shirt and pajama bottoms. Barefoot, he approaches a door adorned with children's drawings, listens briefly, then returns to his room, picking up socks. In his mid-40s, with short dark hair, he crosses to the bathroom, toothbrush in mouth, and opens the children's room door. A younger man in another bedroom jolts awake and listens. Graham rushes from the farmhouse toward a whitewashed barn, while Merrill, the younger man, descends steps. Together, they run through a field of tall maize, stopping at a pathway. A dark-haired girl, about six, stands there. Graham and Merrill run to her; Graham grabs her arms while Merrill picks up Bo. They continue to a fair-haired boy, about 10, gazing across the field. Graham turns Morgan's head to him as Morgan redirects his gaze. As they proceed, Graham anxiously steps onto flattened maize stalks, witnessing a vast circle. Alsatians pace in its center. From above, Graham's family stands in a 100-yard diameter circle, a similar one beside it with a small semi-circle of standing maize.

test_cases.name: Brevity - L2
test_cases.description: Swings, a climbing frame, a picnic table, and a brick barbecue sit in a rural backyard. Inside, a bedside photo shows a smiling family: mum, dad with a clerical collar, a boy, and a girl. The dad, Graham Hess, wakes feverishly, then relaxes and exits his room in a black t-shirt and pajama bottoms. He pauses by a door with children's drawings, listens, and returns to his room, picking up socks. In his mid-40s, rugged and dark-haired, Graham brushes his teeth and glances into a children's room. A younger man in another bedroom wakes suddenly. Graham rushes from his farmhouse to a barn while the younger man, Merrill, follows. They run through tall maize, stopping at a gap to see a path. They find a dark-haired girl, Bo, on the path, and Graham grabs her while Merrill carries her. They reach a fair-haired boy, Morgan, who stares across the field. Morgan directs Graham's gaze. Graham, Merrill, Morgan, and Bo walk through the maize, stopping at a circular area of flattened stalks. Graham tentatively enters, followed by Merrill carrying Bo. In the center, two Alsatians pace. From above, Graham's family stands in a 100-yard-wide circle with another similar circle beside it, partly standing.

test_cases.name: Verbosity - L1
test_cases.description:
In a picturesque and serene rural backyard, there stands a classic set of swings and an adventurous climbing frame, accompanied by a quaint picnic table and a robust brick barbecue. This charming scene is all overlooked by an upstairs window. Moving inside the house, one might notice a framed photograph resting on a bedside table. This picture captures the cherished image of a smiling family: a mother, a father, a young boy, and a girl. Notably, the father is wearing a clerical collar, indicating his profession. Suddenly, this same man abruptly leans up on his elbows in bed, his eyes scanning feverishly around the modestly furnished room. He eventually relaxes and sits up straight. The man, whose name is Graham Hess, emerges from his bedroom, dressed casually in a black t-shirt and pajama bottoms. He quietly walks along the landing in his bare feet until he reaches a closed door, which has a collection of hand-drawn children's pictures stuck to its surface. Graham pauses momentarily to listen intently at the door, then decides to return to his bedroom, picking up a few discarded socks along the way. Graham is a man in his mid-40s with a ruggedly handsome face, characterized by short dark hair. 

As Graham crosses the bathroom area, he takes a moment to stare out of the door, with a toothbrush still in his mouth. He confidently strides across the landing, opens the door to the children's room, and takes a quick glance around. Nearby, a younger man in a similarly decorated rural-style bedroom suddenly jolts awake and tumbles out of bed. He quickly jumps to his feet, straining his ears to listen. Without lingering, Graham rushes out of the wooden farmhouse and heads straight towards a whitewashed barn, while the younger man, Merrill, rapidly descends a flight of steps from the other floor. Together, Graham and Merrill sprint through a vast field of tall, green maize plants. They come to an abrupt stop when they reach a gap and gaze along a clear pathway that cuts through the crop. Standing a little further down the path is a dark-haired girl of about six years old. The two men quickly run over to her, and Graham urgently grabs her by the arms. Merrill swiftly picks up Bo, and Graham continues to dash through the maize. Eventually, he reaches a fair-haired boy of about 10 years old, who is staring glassily across the field. Graham gently turns Morgan's head to make him face him. Morgan then places his hand around his father's jaw, turning his head to face in the direction he had been staring. Graham then stands up and begins to walk cautiously through the maize, followed closely by Merrill, who is still carrying Bo in his arms. Graham pauses and glances around the area with a sense of anxiety. He swallows hard and takes a tentative step forward onto a seemingly sea of flattened maize stalks. Graham stares in wonderment as he, alongside Merrill, Morgan, and Bo, approaches the perimeter of a vast circular expanse of flattened maize. In the center, two large Alsatians pace around uneasily. An aerial view reveals Graham and his family standing within the large circle, which measures approximately 100 yards in diameter. Another crop circle lies beside it, the same size but with a small semi-circle of maize still standing within its perimeter.

test_cases.name: Verbosity - L2
test_cases.description:
In a picturesque and serenely tranquil rural backyard, there stands an invitingly classic set of swings, complemented by an adventurous climbing frame. Nearby, one can also find a quaint and charming picnic table, alongside a robustly built brick barbecue. This enchanting scene is thoughtfully overlooked by an upstairs window that offers a perfect vantage point. Moving inside the house, one might observe a framed photograph carefully resting on a bedside table. This picture beautifully captures a cherished image of a smiling family: a mother, a father, a young boy, and a little girl. Notably, the father is distinguished by a clerical collar, which subtly indicates his professional role. Suddenly, this very same man abruptly leans up on his elbows while in bed, his eyes feverishly scanning around the modestly furnished room. Eventually, he begins to relax before sitting up straight. The man, who is known as Graham Hess, emerges from his bedroom, dressed casually and comfortably in a black t-shirt and pajama bottoms. He quietly makes his way along the landing, walking on his bare feet until he reaches a closed door, which has a collection of hand-drawn children's pictures affixed to its surface. Graham pauses for a moment, listening intently at the door, then decides to return to his bedroom, picking up a few discarded socks scattered along the way. Graham is a man in his mid-40s with a ruggedly handsome face, characterized by his short dark hair.

As Graham crosses the bathroom area, he takes a momentary pause to gaze out of the door, with a toothbrush still poised in his mouth. He then confidently strides across the landing, opens the door to the children's room, and takes a quick glance around. Nearby, in a similarly decorated rural-style bedroom, a younger man suddenly jolts awake and tumbles out of bed. He quickly jumps to his feet, straining his ears as he listens intently. Without lingering or hesitating, Graham rushes out of the wooden farmhouse and heads directly towards a whitewashed barn, while the younger man, Merrill, rapidly descends a flight of steps from another floor. Together, Graham and Merrill sprint as fast as they can through a vast field of tall, green maize plants. They come to an abrupt stop when they reach a gap and gaze along a clear pathway that cuts through the crop. Standing a little further down this path is a dark-haired girl of about six years old. The two men quickly run over to her, and Graham urgently grabs her by the arms. Merrill swiftly picks up Bo in his arms, and Graham continues to dash energetically through the maize. Eventually, he reaches a fair-haired boy of about 10 years old, who is staring glassily across the field. Graham gently turns Morgan's head to make him face him directly. Morgan then places his small hand around his father's jaw, turning his head to face in the direction he had been staring. Graham then stands up, beginning to walk cautiously through the maize, closely followed by Merrill, who is still carrying Bo in his arms. Graham pauses and glances around the area with a palpable sense of anxiety. He swallows hard and takes a tentative step forward onto what seems like a sea of flattened maize stalks. Graham stares in wonderment as he, alongside Merrill, Morgan, and Bo, approaches the perimeter of a vast circular expanse of flattened maize. In the center of this circle, two large Alsatians pace around uneasily. An aerial view reveals Graham and his family standing within the large circle, which measures approximately 100 yards in diameter. Another crop circle lies beside it, identical in size but featuring a small semi-circle of maize still standing within its perimeter.

test_cases.name: Macro-Actions -> Micro-Actions
test_cases.description: In a serene rural backyard, a set of swings and a climbing frame are perfectly positioned alongside a picnic table and a brick barbecue, all of which are overlooked by an upstairs window. Inside this window, there is a bedroom where a framed photo sits on a bedside table, capturing a smiling family comprising a mum, dad, a young boy, and a girl, with the dad donning a clerical collar. Suddenly, in a moment of abrupt awareness, the same man from the photo leans up on his elbows in bed, his eyes scanning feverishly around the simply furnished room. As a wave of calmness washes over him, he relaxes and proceeds to sit up. This man, Graham Hess, clad in a black t-shirt and pajama bottoms, emerges from his bedroom and walks along the landing in his bare feet, coming to a halt at a closed door adorned with hand-drawn children's pictures. He pauses momentarily to listen intently at the door, decides not to enter, and then retraces his steps back to his bedroom, picking up some discarded socks along the way. Graham, a man in his mid-40s with short dark hair and a rugged handsome face, crosses into the bathroom and momentarily stares out the door, toothbrush in mouth, before taking purposeful strides across the landing to open the door to the children's room. He casts a quick glance around the room before a sudden noise draws attention to a younger man in a similar rural-style bedroom who jolts awake, tumbles out of bed, and jumps to his feet, straining to understand what he's hearing. Meanwhile, Graham hastens out of his wooden farmhouse and makes his way towards a whitewashed barn, as the younger man, Merrill, races down a flight of steps from another floor. Together, Graham and Merrill charge through a field of tall green maize, only stopping when they reach a gap that reveals a clear pathway slicing through the crop. Ahead stands a dark-haired girl, approximately six years old, further down the path. The two men sprint over to her, with Graham reaching her first and gently grasping her arms. Merrill quickly lifts Bo up, and Graham, determined, rushes on through the maize until he reaches a fair-haired boy, about 10 years old, who is staring intently across the field with glazed eyes. Graham gently turns Morgan's head to face him, but Morgan places his hand around his father's jaw, redirecting Graham's gaze to align with his own. As comprehension dawns, Graham stands and begins to walk slowly through the sea of maize, Merrill trailing behind, still carrying Bo in his arms. As Graham halts, he surveys the surroundings anxiously, swallowing hard before he tentatively steps forward onto a vast area of flattened maize stalks. In a moment of awe and wonder, Graham, Merrill, Morgan, and Bo arrive at the perimeter of a massive circular expanse where the maize has been entirely flattened, while two large Alsatians pace restlessly in the center. An aerial perspective reveals the scene with Graham and his family standing within the circle, approximately 100 yards in diameter, and another crop circle situated beside it, identical in size but distinguished by a small semi-circle of standing maize at its core.

test_cases.name: Micro-Actions -> Macro-Actions
test_cases.description: A rural backyard features swings, a climbing frame, a picnic table, and a brick barbecue, all visible from an upstairs window. Inside a bedroom, a framed photo on a bedside table depicts a smiling family: mum, dad, a young boy, and a girl, with the dad in a clerical collar. Suddenly, the same man, Graham Hess, wakes up, sits up in bed, and, after surveying the simple room, exits wearing a black t-shirt and pajama bottoms. As he walks barefoot along the landing, he pauses at a door adorned with children's drawings, listens briefly, and then returns to his bedroom, picking up some socks. In his mid-40s, with short dark hair and ruggedly handsome features, Graham brushes his teeth while glancing out the bathroom door before crossing the landing to the children's room for a quick look. Meanwhile, a younger man in another rural-style bedroom startles awake, listens intently, and then hurries downstairs. Graham rushes out of his farmhouse toward a whitewashed barn, joined by the younger man, Merrill. Together, they sprint through a field of maize, stopping at a gap with a clear pathway. Down the path, they spot a six-year-old girl. The men run to her; Graham grabs her arms, and Merrill lifts Bo as Graham continues through the maize to a fair-haired boy who gazes across the field. Graham redirects Morgan's attention, and Morgan guides his father’s gaze to what he was staring at. Graham, joined by Merrill with Bo, walks through the maize, stopping at a vast circle of flattened maize stalks. In awe, they stand at the perimeter, observing two large Alsatians pacing uneasily in the center. An aerial view reveals the family at the circle's edge, 100 yards in diameter, adjacent to another crop circle of the same size with a small standing semi-circle of maize.

test_cases.name: Insert Attributes, Emotions and Scene
test_cases.description: A set of swings and a climbing frame stand in a rural backyard, typical of homes nestled in the expansive countryside known for its serene landscapes, along with a picnic table and a brick barbecue, structures that often host family gatherings, overlooked by an upstairs window which offers a sweeping view of the surrounding fields. Inside, a framed photo on a bedside table shows a smiling family: mum, dad, a young boy, and a girl. The dad wears a clerical collar, indicating his role as a priest or pastor in a local church community. Suddenly, the same man leans up on his elbows in bed, his eyes darting feverishly around the simply furnished room, which is adorned with rustic wooden furniture common in rural homes. He relaxes and sits up. The man, Graham Hess, a former Episcopal priest who left the ministry after a personal tragedy, comes out of his bedroom wearing a black t-shirt and pajama bottoms. He walks along the landing in his bare feet, feeling the cool hardwood floors beneath him, and comes to a closed door with some hand-drawn children's pictures stuck to it, showcasing the creativity of his children. Graham pauses for a moment to listen at the door, then returns to his bedroom, picking up some discarded socks on the way. He's in his mid-40s with short dark hair and a rugged handsome face that hints at a life spent mostly outdoors. Graham crosses the bathroom and stares out of the door, his toothbrush in his mouth, the minty taste lingering as he surveys his home. He strides across the landing, opens the door to the children's room, and glances around, noting the peacefulness that contrasts with his earlier tension. A younger man in a similar rural-style bedroom, reflecting the simplicity and functionality needed in a working farmhouse, suddenly jolts and tumbles out of bed. He jumps to his feet and strains to listen. Graham rushes out of his wooden farmhouse, originally built in the early 20th century as part of a homesteading effort, and heads towards a whitewashed barn, once used for housing livestock but now renovated for storage, while the younger man runs down a flight of steps from the other floor. Graham and the young man, Merrill, his brother who moved in to help with the farm after a failed baseball career, charge through a field of tall green maize, grown in neat rows for harvest season. They stop when they reach a gap and look along a clear pathway, which cuts through the crop. A dark-haired girl of about six-years-old stands a little further down the path. The two men run over to her, and Graham grabs her by the arms. Merrill picks up Bo, the little girl known for her quirky habit of leaving half-full glasses of water around the house, and Graham dashes on through the maize. He reaches a fair-haired boy of about 10, who stares glassily across the field. Graham turns Morgan's head to face him, sensing something extraordinary in his son's expression. Morgan puts his hand around his father's jaw and turns his head to face in the direction he had been staring. Graham stands and slowly walks through the maize, shadowed by Merrill, who's still carrying Bo in his arms. Graham stops and glances around anxiously, noticing the rustling of maize leaves in the breeze. He swallows hard and tentatively steps forward onto a sea of flattened maize stalks. Graham stares in wonder as he, Merrill, Morgan, and Bo come to the perimeter of a vast circular expanse of flattened maize, recognizing it as a crop circle, a phenomenon often attributed to extraterrestrial activity or human pranksters. Two large Alsatians, known for their herding instincts, pace around uneasily in the center. An aerial view shows Graham and his family standing in the circle, which is about 100 yards in diameter, a staggering sight that seems to defy simple explanation. Another crop circle lies beside it, the same size but with a small semi-circle of maize still standing within it, creating an intricate pattern whose meaning is elusive.

test_cases.name: Addition (~50%)
test_cases.description: A set of swings and a climbing frame stand in a rural backyard along with a picnic table and a brick barbecue overlooked by an upstairs window. Inside a framed photo on a bedside table shows a smiling family mum dad a young boy and a girl. The dad wears a clerical collar. Suddenly the same man leans up on his elbows in bed his eyes darting feverishly around the simply furnished room. He relaxes and sits up. The man Graham Hess comes out of his bedroom wearing a black tshirt and pajama bottoms. He walks along the landing in his bare feet and comes to a closed door with some handdrawn children's pictures stuck to it. Graham pauses for a moment to listen at the door then returns to his bedroom picking up some discarded socks on the way. He is in his mid40s with short dark hair and a rugged handsome face. Graham crosses the bathroom and stares out of the door his toothbrush in his mouth. He strides across the landing opens the door to the children's room and glances around. A younger man in a similar ruralstyle bedroom suddenly jolts and tumbles out of bed. He jumps to his feet and strains to listen. Graham rushes out of his wooden farmhouse and heads towards a whitewashed barn while the younger man runs down a flight of steps from the other floor. Graham and the young man. Merrill charge through a field of tall green maize. In the neonlit back alleys of a dystopian metropolis a rogue hacker races against time while being chased by relentless cyborg enforcers their footsteps echoing off rainsoaked pavement. Under the relentless desert sun a lone gunslinger confronts a notorious outlaw at a deserted crossroads both men exchanging steely glances as swirling dust blurs the horizon. On a foggy evening in Victorian London an intrepid detective uncovers a hidden conspiracy among the city’s elite with gaslit streets setting the stage for a race against a mounting darkness. High above a sprawling city skyline a daredevil pilot executes deathdefying maneuvers in a vintage biplane narrowly evading enemy fire as the ground morphs into a dizzying mosaic below. Within the creaking walls of an old countryside manor an estranged family gathers for a mysterious inheritance their hushed whispers and secret glances weaving a tapestry of betrayal and suspense. Amidst the roaring tempest of a stormy ocean a weathered sailor battles nature’s fury on a creaking vessel his resolve as steadfast as the crashing waves that threaten to engulf him. On a bustling 1960s New York street a passionate artist finds unexpected inspiration in the chaotic interplay of urban life capturing moments of love loss and defiant hope on a rainsoaked canvas. Deep in the heart of an enchanted forest a brave knight embarks on a perilous quest to rescue a captive princess facing mythical creatures and treacherous traps with unwavering courage. During a heated political rally in a futuristic city a charismatic leader stokes both hope and dissent. as holographic banners illuminate the night sky and fervent crowds surge with anticipation. In the eerie silence of a postapocalyptic wasteland a hardened survivor scavenges through abandoned ruins haunted by the echoes of a oncethriving civilization now reduced to dust. Beneath the shimmering surface of an underwater kingdom a rebellious mermaid defies ancient traditions to explore forbidden coral reefs and secret caverns brimming with forgotten lore. In the quiet confines of a suburban attic an unassuming teenager stumbles upon a mysterious portal that thrusts him into a surreal world where the very fabric of time and space unravels. On the rugged highlands of Scotland a stoic warrior faces rival clans and ancient curses alike his fierce battle cry resonating across mistcovered moors and turbulent skies. Amid the vibrant chaos of a South American carnival a fearless dancer twirls through streets bursting with color and rhythm each graceful move challenging the rigid boundaries of tradition. During a clandestine meeting in a snowcovered mountain lodge two rival spies exchange cryptic messages hinting at an imminent global conspiracy. They stop when they reach a gap and look along a clear pathway which cuts through the crop. A darkhaired girl of about sixyearsold stands a little further down the path. The two men run over to her and Graham grabs her by the arms. Merrill picks up Bo and Graham dashes on through the maize. He reaches a fairhaired boy of about 10 who stares glassily across the field. Graham turns Morgan's head to face him. Morgan puts his hand around his father's jaw and turns his head to face in the direction he had been staring. Graham stands and slowly walks through the maize followed by Merrill who is still carrying Bo in his arms. Graham stops and glances around anxiously. He swallows hard and tentatively steps forward onto a sea of flattened maize stalks. Graham stares in wonder as he Merrill. Morgan and Bo come to the perimeter of a vast circular expanse of flattened maize. Two large Alsatians pace around uneasily in the center. An aerial view shows Graham and his family standing in the circle which is about 100 yards in diameter. Another crop circle lies beside it. the same size but with a small semicircle of maize still standing within it.

test_cases.name: Addition (~80%)
test_cases.description: A set of swings and a climbing frame stand in a rural backyard along with a picnic table and a brick barbecue overlooked by an upstairs window. Inside a framed photo on a bedside table shows a smiling family mum dad a young boy and a girl. The dad wears a clerical collar. Suddenly the same man leans up on his elbows in bed his eyes darting feverishly around the simply furnished room. He relaxes and sits up. The man Graham Hess comes out of his bedroom wearing a black tshirt and pajama bottoms. He walks along the landing in his bare feet and comes to a closed door with some handdrawn children's pictures stuck to it. Graham pauses for a moment to listen at the door then returns to his bedroom picking up some discarded socks on the way. He is in his mid40s with short dark hair and a rugged handsome face. Graham crosses the bathroom and stares out of the door his toothbrush in his mouth. He strides across the landing opens the door to the children's room and glances around. A younger man in a similar ruralstyle bedroom suddenly jolts and tumbles out of bed. He jumps to his feet and strains to listen. Graham rushes out of his wooden farmhouse and heads towards a whitewashed barn while the younger man runs down a flight of steps from the other floor. Graham and the young man. Merrill charge through a field of tall green maize. In the neonlit back alleys of a dystopian metropolis a rogue hacker races against time while being chased by relentless cyborg enforcers their footsteps echoing off rainsoaked pavement. Under the relentless desert sun a lone gunslinger confronts a notorious outlaw at a deserted crossroads both men exchanging steely glances as swirling dust blurs the horizon. On a foggy evening in Victorian London an intrepid detective uncovers a hidden conspiracy among the city’s elite with gaslit streets setting the stage for a race against a mounting darkness. High above a sprawling city skyline a daredevil pilot executes deathdefying maneuvers in a vintage biplane narrowly evading enemy fire as the ground morphs into a dizzying mosaic below. Within the creaking walls of an old countryside manor an estranged family gathers for a mysterious inheritance their hushed whispers and secret glances weaving a tapestry of betrayal and suspense. Amidst the roaring tempest of a stormy ocean a weathered sailor battles nature’s fury on a creaking vessel his resolve as steadfast as the crashing waves that threaten to engulf him. On a bustling 1960s New York street a passionate artist finds unexpected inspiration in the chaotic interplay of urban life capturing moments of love loss and defiant hope on a rainsoaked canvas. Deep in the heart of an enchanted forest a brave knight embarks on a perilous quest to rescue a captive princess facing mythical creatures and treacherous traps with unwavering courage. During a heated political rally in a futuristic city a charismatic leader stokes both hope and dissent. as holographic banners illuminate the night sky and fervent crowds surge with anticipation. In the eerie silence of a postapocalyptic wasteland a hardened survivor scavenges through abandoned ruins haunted by the echoes of a oncethriving civilization now reduced to dust. Beneath the shimmering surface of an underwater kingdom a rebellious mermaid defies ancient traditions to explore forbidden coral reefs and secret caverns brimming with forgotten lore. In the quiet confines of a suburban attic an unassuming teenager stumbles upon a mysterious portal that thrusts him into a surreal world where the very fabric of time and space unravels. On the rugged highlands of Scotland a stoic warrior faces rival clans and ancient curses alike his fierce battle cry resonating across mistcovered moors and turbulent skies. In a bustling marketplace in ancient Persia a cunning street thief navigates labyrinthine alleyways and vibrant bazaars. his calculated every move a daring escape from the everwatchful royal guards. He swallows hard and tentatively steps forward onto a sea of flattened maize stalks. Graham stares in wonder as he Merrill. test_cases.description: A set of swings and a climbing frame stand in a rural backyard along with a picnic table and a brick barbecue overlooked by an upstairs window. test_cases.name: Subject Corruption
test_cases.description: A set of swings and a climbing frame stand in a rural backyard, along with a picnic table and a brick barbecue, overlooked by an upstairs window. Inside, a framed photo on a bedside table shows a smiling family: a raccoon, a dolphin, a young boy, and a girl. The dolphin wears a clerical collar. Suddenly, the same animal leans up on its elbows in bed, its eyes darting feverishly around the simply furnished room. It relaxes and sits up. The dolphin, Graham Hess, comes out of its bedroom wearing a black t-shirt and pajama bottoms. It walks along the landing in its bare feet and comes to a closed door with some hand-drawn children's pictures stuck to it. Graham pauses for a moment to listen at the door, then returns to its bedroom, picking up some discarded socks on the way. It's in its mid-40s with short dark hair and a rugged handsome face. Graham crosses the bathroom and stares out of the door, its toothbrush in its mouth. It strides across the landing, opens the door to the children's room, and glances around. A younger turtle in a similar rural-style bedroom suddenly jolts and tumbles out of bed. It jumps to its feet and strains to listen. Graham rushes out of its wooden farmhouse and heads towards a whitewashed barn, while the younger turtle runs down a flight of steps from the other floor. Graham and the turtle, Merrill, charge through a field of tall green maize. They stop when they reach a gap and look along a clear pathway, which cuts through the crop. A dark-haired girl of about six-years-old stands a little further down the path. The dolphin and the turtle run over to her, and Graham grabs her by the arms. Merrill picks up Bo, and Graham dashes on through the maize. It reaches a fair-haired boy of about 10, who stares glassily across the field. Graham turns Morgan's head to face it. Morgan puts its hand around the dolphin's jaw and turns its head to face in the direction it had been staring. Graham stands and slowly walks through the maize, followed by Merrill, who's still carrying Bo in its arms. Graham stops and glances around anxiously. It swallows hard and tentatively steps forward onto a sea of flattened maize stalks. Graham stares in wonder as it, Merrill, Morgan, and Bo come to the perimeter of a vast circular expanse of flattened maize. Two large flamingos pace around uneasily in the center. An aerial view shows Graham and its family standing in the circle, which is about 100 yards in diameter. Another crop circle lies beside it, the same size but with a small semi-circle of maize still standing within it.

test_cases.name: Object Corruption
test_cases.description: A set of hammocks and a seesaw stand in a suburban front yard, along with a garden bench and a stone fountain, overlooked by a downstairs window. Inside, a framed map on a bookshelf shows a cheerful family: mum, dad, a young boy, and a girl. The dad wears a painter's apron. Suddenly, the same man props himself up on his elbows in bed, his eyes darting feverishly around the elaborately decorated room. He relaxes and sits up. The man, Graham Hess, comes out of his bedroom wearing a white shirt and cargo shorts. He walks along the hallway in his slippers and comes to a closed door with some stained-glass panels fixed to it. Graham pauses for a moment to listen at the door, then returns to his bedroom, picking up some discarded towels on the way. He's in his mid-40s with short blond hair and a rugged handsome face. Graham crosses the kitchen and stares out of the window, his hairbrush in his hand. He strides across the hallway, opens the door to the children's room, and glances around. A younger man in a similar suburban-style living room suddenly jolts and tumbles off the couch. He jumps to his feet and strains to listen. Graham rushes out of his brick townhouse and heads towards a painted garage, while the younger man runs down a spiral staircase from the upper floor. Graham and the young man, Merrill, charge through a meadow of tall green wheat. They stop when they reach a break and look along a clear pathway, which cuts through the grain. A dark-haired girl of about six years old stands a little further down the path. The two men run over to her, and Graham grabs her by the arms. Merrill picks up Bo, and Graham dashes on through the wheat. He reaches a fair-haired boy of about 10, who stares glassily across the field. Graham turns Morgan's head to face him. Morgan puts his hand around his father's jaw and turns his head to face in the direction he had been staring. Graham stands and slowly walks through the wheat, followed by Merrill, who's still carrying Bo in his arms. Graham stops and glances around anxiously. He swallows hard and tentatively steps forward onto a sea of flattened wheat stalks. Graham stares in wonder as he, Merrill, Morgan, and Bo come to the perimeter of a vast circular expanse of flattened wheat. Two large retrievers pace around uneasily in the center. An aerial view shows Graham and his family standing in the circle, which is about 100 yards in diameter. Another barley circle lies beside it, the same size but with a small semi-circle of wheat still standing within it.

test_cases.name: Action Corruption
test_cases.description: A set of swings and a climbing frame rest in a rural backyard, alongside a picnic table and a brick barbecue, viewed from an upstairs window. Inside, a framed photo on a bedside table reveals a laughing family: mum, dad, a young boy, and a girl. The dad sports a clerical collar. Suddenly, the same man jerks up on his elbows in bed, his eyes flickering nervously around the simply furnished room. He calms and stretches up. The man, Graham Hess, exits his bedroom wearing a black t-shirt and pajama bottoms. He creeps along the landing in his bare feet and arrives at a closed door with some hand-drawn children's pictures attached to it. Graham hesitates for a moment to glance at the door, then marches to his bedroom, picking up some scattered socks on the way. He's in his mid-40s with short dark hair and a rugged handsome face. Graham passes through the bathroom and gazes out of the door, his toothbrush clutched in his mouth. He ambles across the landing, opens the door to the children's room, and peers around. A younger man in a similar rural-style bedroom suddenly starts and rolls out of bed. He leaps to his feet and strains to peer. Graham bolts out of his wooden farmhouse and proceeds towards a whitewashed barn, while the younger man skips down a flight of steps from the other floor. Graham and the young man, Merrill, stroll through a field of tall green maize. They halt when they reach a gap and gaze along a clear pathway, which slices through the crop. A dark-haired girl of about six-years-old rests a little further down the path. The two men stroll over to her, and Graham grasps her by the arms. Merrill lifts Bo, and Graham strides on through the maize. He approaches a fair-haired boy of about 10, who glares blankly across the field. Graham rotates Morgan's head to face him. Morgan clasps his hand around his father's jaw and swivels his head to face in the direction he had been glaring. Graham rises and casually treads through the maize, followed by Merrill, who's still clutching Bo in his arms. Graham halts and surveys around nervously. He gulps hard and gingerly steps forward onto a sea of flattened maize stalks. Graham glances in amazement as he, Merrill, Morgan, and Bo approach the perimeter of a vast circular expanse of flattened maize. Two large Alsatians wander around uneasily in the center. An aerial view portrays Graham and his family standing in the circle, which is about 100 yards in diameter. Another crop circle lies beside it, the same size but with a small semi-circle of maize still standing within it.

test_cases.name: Subject-Object Corruption
test_cases.description: A set of chimneys and a washing line stand in a desert courtyard, along with a shuffleboard court and a stone fountain, overlooked by a basement porthole. Inside, a framed painting on a dining table shows a grinning orchestra: conductor, violinist, a young drummer, and a pianist. The violinist wears a pirate hat. Suddenly, the same scarecrow leans up on its elbows in a hammock, its eyes darting feverishly around the elaborately decorated tent. It relaxes and sits up. The scarecrow, Lionel Mitchell, comes out of its hammock wearing a crimson raincoat and denim shorts. It walks along the pier in its bare feet and comes to a locked trunk with some hand-painted jockey uniforms stuck to it. Lionel pauses for a moment to listen at the trunk, then returns to its hammock, picking up some discarded mittens on the way. It's in its mid-200s with flowing rainbow hair and a ruggedly charming face. Lionel crosses the library and stares out of the portcullis, its umbrella in its mouth. It strides across the pier, opens the trunk to the jockey's compartment, and glances around. A giant pumpkin in a similar desert-style courtyard suddenly jolts and rolls out of its hammock. It jumps to its fins and strains to listen. Lionel rushes out of its wooden igloo and heads towards a pink-streaked yurt, while the giant pumpkin rolls down a flight of escalators from the opposite balcony. Lionel and the pumpkin, Clover, charge through a field of tall blue radishes. They stop when they reach a chasm and look along a narrow boardwalk, which cuts through the foliage. A dark-haired fish of about six weeks old flutters a little further down the boardwalk. The two beings swim over to it, and Lionel grabs it by the fins. Clover picks up Tulip, and Lionel paddles on through the radishes. It reaches a fair-haired squirrel of about 10, who stares glassily across the orchard. Lionel turns Fern's head to face it. Fern puts its paw around its father's antenna and turns its head to face in the direction it had been staring. Lionel stands and slowly walks through the radishes, followed by Clover, who's still carrying Tulip in its fins. Lionel stops and glances around anxiously. It swallows hard and tentatively steps forward onto a pool of flattened radish leaves. Lionel stares in wonder as it, Clover, Fern, and Tulip come to the edge of a vast diamond-shaped expanse of flattened radishes. Two large dolphins pace around uneasily in the center. An aerial view shows Lionel and its orchestra standing in the boardwalk, which is about 100 paces in diameter. Another fern ring lies beside it, the same size but with a small crescent of radishes still standing within it.

test_cases.name: Subject-Action Corruption
test_cases.description: A collection of slides and a jungle gym rest in a suburban courtyard, alongside a garden bench and a stone grill, overlooking a downstairs patio. Outside, a poster on a mantelpiece depicts a frowning group: grandmother, teacher, an elderly gentleman, and a toddler. The teacher sports a pirate hat. Abruptly, the same gentleman springs up on his knees by a dresser, his ears twitching anxiously around the ornately decorated lounge. He tenses up and stands upright. The gentleman, Oliver Trent, emerges from his kitchen wearing a red sweater and denim shorts. He skips along the hallway in his booted feet and arrives at an open window with some cartoonish drawings pinned to it. Oliver hesitates for a moment to sniff at the air, then retreats to his kitchen, scooping up some stray gloves along the way. He's in his late 50s with long blonde hair and a gentle serene expression. Oliver enters the closet and glances out of the window, a comb in his hand. He prances across the hallway, shuts the window to the office, and peers around. An older woman in a similar urban-style parlor suddenly startles and rolls off the couch. She vaults to her feet and strains to see. Oliver dashes out of his stone bungalow and strides towards a blue-painted garage, while the older woman strolls up a series of steps from the other entrance. Oliver and the older woman, Eliza, meander through a meadow of tall golden wheat. They pause when they encounter a clearing and gaze along a narrow trail, which threads through the undergrowth. A red-haired boy of about nine-years-old perches a little further up the trail. The two individuals stroll over to him, and Oliver pats him on the shoulders. Eliza lifts Tom, and Oliver trots on through the wheat. He approaches a dark-haired girl of about 12, who gazes dreamily across the meadow. Oliver tilts Emma's chin to face him. Emma taps her cousin's elbow and turns his face to view in the direction she had been gazing. Oliver stoops and gently moves through the wheat, accompanied by Eliza, who’s still holding Tom in her arms. Oliver halts and surveys the surroundings nervously. He breathes deeply and gingerly steps forward onto a patch of flattened wheat stalks. Oliver gapes in amazement as he, Eliza, Emma, and Tom reach the boundary of an extensive oval region of flattened wheat. Two large collies circle around restlessly in the middle. An overhead perspective shows Oliver and his companions standing in the oval, which is about 100 meters in width. An additional crop circle lies next to it, identical in size but with a tiny triangle of wheat still upright within it.

test_cases.name: Object-Action Corruption
test_cases.description: A set of slides and a jumping castle stand in a rural courtyard, along with a dining bench and a wooden stove, overlooked by an attic skylight. Inside, a painted portrait on a mantelpiece shows a cheerful family: mum, dad, a young boy, and a girl. The dad wears a cowboy hat. Suddenly, the same man lifts himself up on his knees in bed, his eyes scanning sharply around the plainly decorated space. He eases back and stands up. The man, Graham Hess, emerges from his bedroom wearing a brown sweater and cargo pants. He tiptoes along the hallway in his woolen socks and arrives at a closed door with some hand-drawn children's animals taped to it. Graham hesitates momentarily to eavesdrop at the door, then heads back to his bedroom, grabbing some misplaced gloves on the way. He's in his mid-40s with short dark hair and a rugged handsome face. Graham crosses the kitchen and peers out of the door, his comb in his mouth. He marches across the hallway, opens the door to the children's playroom, and scans the area. A younger man in a similar rustic-style bedroom suddenly jerks and stumbles out of bed. He leaps to his feet and strains to hear. Graham bolts out of his wooden farmhouse and sprints towards a red barn, while the younger man dashes down a flight of ladders from the other floor. Graham and the young man, Merrill, sprint through a field of tall golden sunflowers. They stop when they reach a clearing and look along a dirt pathway, which winds through the crop. A dark-haired girl of about six-years-old stands a little further down the path. The two men rush over to her, and Graham lifts her by the shoulders. Merrill picks up Bo, and Graham bolts on through the sunflowers. He reaches a fair-haired boy of about 10, who gazes blankly across the field. Graham turns Morgan's gaze to meet his. Morgan puts his palm around his father's chin and turns his head to face in the direction he had been staring. Graham stands and slowly walks through the sunflowers, followed by Merrill, who's still carrying Bo in his arms. Graham pauses and looks around nervously. He gulps and slowly steps forward onto a sea of flattened sunflower stalks. Graham stares in awe as he, Merrill, Morgan, and Bo arrive at the boundary of a vast circular expanse of flattened sunflowers. Two large collies wander around uneasily in the center. An aerial view shows Graham and his family standing in the circle, which is about 100 yards in diameter. Another crop circle lies beside it, the same size but with a small semi-circle of sunflowers still standing within it.

test_cases.name: Subject-Action-Object Corruption
test_cases.description: A collection of scooters and a slide stand in a bustling courtyard, alongside a chessboard and a metal grill, observed by a streetlight. Outside, a crumpled map on a coffee table displays a thoughtful couple: a pilot, a chef, a young cat, and a bird. The pilot wears a flower crown. Abruptly, the same person flips up on their hands on a bench, their fingers twitching calmly around the colorfully decorated area. They tense and stand up. The person, Arthur Lane, strolls out of their kitchen wearing a blue hoodie and jogging shorts. They amble along the promenade in their bright shoes and approach an open window with some printed travel brochures taped to it. Arthur hesitates for an instant to whistle at the window, then ventures back to the kitchen, retrieving some forgotten slippers on the journey. They're in their early 30s with long blonde hair and a quirky amused expression. Arthur maneuvers through the garage and peers out of the window, their comb in their hand. They march across the promenade, swings open the window to the children's playroom, and peers inside. An older woman in a similar suburban-style living room suddenly leaps and rolls out of an armchair. She springs to her feet and yawns to taste. Arthur jogs out of their brick villa and strides towards a yellowish greenhouse, while the older woman skips up a series of ladders to the attic. Arthur and the older woman, Sandra, glide through a meadow of short purple lavender. They pause when they reach an opening and observe a covered bridge, which zigzags through the flowers. A blonde cat of about two-years-old lounges a little further down the bridge. The two people trot over to it, and Arthur nudges it by the ears. Sandra scoops up Max, and Arthur leaps on across the lavender. They find a dark-haired rabbit of about 5, who gazes vacantly over the meadow. Arthur rotates Lily's paws to face them. Lily places their elbow around their parent's shoulder and rotates their face to focus in the direction they had been gazing. Arthur stands and gently hops through the lavender, shadowed by Sandra, who's still cradling Max in their hands. Arthur halts and peers around curiously. They gulp quietly and gingerly stroll onward onto a sheet of trampled purple petals. Arthur gawks in amazement as they, Sandra, Lily, and Max wander to the boundary of a tremendous oval patch of flattened lavender. Two small squirrels dance around merrily in the middle. A panoramic shot shows Arthur and their guild lounging in the field, which is about 300 feet in length. Another floral pattern reveals itself beside it, the same dimensions but with a tiny quarter-moon of lavender still flourishing within it.

test_cases.name: Complete Corruption
test_cases.description: The film starts with a man waking up in a small apartment. He prepares coffee and checks his phone for messages. There are none, so he heads out to catch a bus. On the way, he passes a neighbor who greets him briefly. At the bus stop, he notices a group of students talking about an upcoming test. He boards the bus and sits near the back, watching the city pass by outside the window. After a few stops, he gets off near a large office building. He enters the lobby and goes through security. He rides an elevator to the tenth floor, where he works as an assistant. His manager asks him to prepare some documents for a meeting later in the day. He collects files from different departments and organizes them in a conference room. Another employee asks him for help with a software issue, so he takes a few minutes to fix it. Then he returns to the conference room to double-check everything before the meeting begins. The meeting starts at noon. Several people join via video call, and others sit around the table. The manager outlines the project goals, and each team member shares updates on their tasks. There are questions about deadlines and budgets, but no big surprises. After an hour, they end the call. The manager thanks everyone and leaves. The assistant cleans up the room, collects leftover notes, and heads back to his desk. During lunch, he walks to a nearby café, where he orders a simple meal. He eats alone and checks social media on his phone. After lunch, he returns to the office and finishes smaller tasks, such as sending emails and filing paperwork. He also helps a coworker carry boxes of supplies to another floor. Later in the afternoon, the manager calls him in to discuss next week's schedule. They go over a few changes, and the assistant updates the calendar. When the workday ends, he logs off his computer and leaves the building. Outside, he walks a few blocks to meet a friend. They chat about weekend plans and decide to see a film on Saturday. The assistant then heads home on a crowded bus. At his apartment, he sorts his mail, feeds a pet cat, and warms up leftovers for dinner. He watches a short news segment on TV, then checks his phone again. A message from his friend confirms their plan for the weekend. He feels relieved to have something to look forward to. The film ends with him preparing for bed, setting an alarm, and turning off the lights. He reflects briefly on the day, thinking about his tasks, his quiet home, and the plans ahead.

test_cases.name: Summarization
test_cases.description: A rural backyard features swings, a climbing frame, a picnic table, and a barbecue, overseen by an upstairs window. Inside, a photo of a smiling family with dad in a clerical collar is seen on a bedside table. Graham Hess, the dad, wakes abruptly, glances around his simple bedroom, and checks a children's room adorned with drawings before heading outside. In his 40s, with rugged features, Graham and his brother Merrill rush through a maize field upon seeing something unusual. They find Graham's daughter Bo and son Morgan standing in the crop. Graham turns Morgan's attention, and both face the same direction with concern. As Graham, Merrill carrying Bo, and Morgan navigate through the field, they discover a vast, circular area of flattened maize with pacing Alsatians in the center. The aerial view reveals another crop circle with a small semi-circle still standing beside it.

rural backyard along with a picnic table and a brick barbecue overlooked by an upstairs window

test_cases.name: Jumble Segments Order
test_cases.description: Graham stares in wonder as he Merrill The man Graham Hess comes out of his bedroom wearing a black tshirt and pajama bottoms He strides across the landing opens the door to the children's room and glances around Merrill charge through a field of tall green maize He swallows hard and tentatively steps forward onto a sea of flattened maize stalks A younger man in a similar ruralstyle bedroom suddenly jolts and tumbles out of bed Morgan puts his hand around his father's jaw and turns his head to face in the direction he had been staring He walks along the landing in his bare feet and comes to a closed door with some handdrawn children's pictures stuck to it Merrill picks up Bo and Graham dashes on through the maize He jumps to his feet and strains to listen They stop when they reach a gap and look along a clear pathway which cuts through the crop Graham crosses the bathroom and stares out of the door his toothbrush in his mouth Two large Alsatians pace around uneasily in the center Graham and the young man Graham stops and glances around anxiously He reaches a fairhaired boy of about 10 who stares glassily across the field Another crop circle lies beside it Inside a framed photo on a bedside table shows a smiling family mum dad a young boy and a girl Graham rushes out of his wooden farmhouse and heads towards a whitewashed barn while the younger man runs down a flight of steps from the other floor The two men run over to her and Graham grabs her by the arms The dad wears a clerical collar A darkhaired girl of about sixyearsold stands a little further down the path Graham turns Morgan's head to face him Suddenly the same man leans up on his elbows in bed his eyes darting feverishly around the simply furnished room An aerial view shows Graham and his family standing in the circle which is about 100 yards in diameter He relaxes and sits up Morgan and Bo come to the perimeter of a vast circular expanse of flattened maize the same size but with a small semicircle of maize still standing within it He is in his mid40s with short dark hair and a rugged handsome face Graham stands and slowly walks through the maize followed by Merrill who is still carrying Bo in his arms A set of swings and a climbing frame stand in a rural backyard along with a picnic table and a brick barbecue overlooked by an upstairs window Graham pauses for a moment to listen at the door then returns to his bedroom picking up some discarded socks on the way

in the circle which is about 100 yards in diameter Another crop circle lies beside it the same size but with a small semicircle of maize still standing within it A set of swings and a climbing frame stand in a rural backyard along with a picnic table and a brick barbecue overlooked by an upstairs window Inside a framed photo on a bedside table shows a smiling family mum dad a young boy and a girl The dad wears a clerical collar Suddenly the same man leans up on his elbows in bed his eyes darting feverishly around the simply furnished room He relaxes and sits up The man Graham Hess comes out of his bedroom wearing a black tshirt and pajama bottoms He walks along the landing in his bare feet and comes to a closed door with some handdrawn children's pictures stuck to it Graham pauses for a moment to listen at the door then returns to his bedroom picking up some discarded socks on the way He is in his mid40s with short dark hair and a rugged handsome face Graham crosses the bathroom and stares out of the door his toothbrush in his mouth He strides across the landing opens the door to the children's room and glances around A younger man in a similar ruralstyle bedroom suddenly jolts and tumbles out of bed He jumps to his feet and strains to listen Graham rushes out of his wooden farmhouse and heads towards a whitewashed barn while the younger man runs down a flight of steps from the other floor Graham and the young man Merrill charge through a field of tall green maize
